data.text: “Koro winja, yaye Jakobo jatichna,
Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye,
Nimar abiro kelo koth ne piny mobaro okak
Ginidongi mana ka lum man kama ngʼich
Moro kuomgi nowacho ni, ‘An ngʼat Jehova Nyasaye.’
“Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye Maratego ma
Ere kare ngʼama chal koda? Ochungane owachi.
Kik chunyi nyosre bende kik ibed maluor.
Jogo duto maloso nyiseche manono gin joma nono,
En ngʼa manyalo loso nyasaye mar bao
En kaachiel gi joma chalo kode noyud wichkuot;
Jatheth ema keto chuma e mach mi chwakre
Japecho pimo bao gi tol kendo oketo kido kuome;
Ne onyalo ngʼado yiend sida kata yiend ober.
Dir yadhno ochwakogo chiemo,
Dir yadhno ochwako e kendo mi olosgo chiemo,
Bath yien modongʼ opayo mi olosgo nyasaye,
Onge gima gingʼeyo, onge gima giwinjo;
Onge ngʼama hore mapar, onge ngʼama nigi ngʼeyo
Ochamo buru, chunye mobam wuonde;
“Par gigi, yaye Jakobo,
Asekeyo timbeni manono mana ka boche polo,
Weruru gi mor,
“Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye
oketho ranyisi mag jonabi mariambo
kendo okawo weche jotichne
bende mawachone nembe ni, ‘Dwon,
kendo owuoyo kuom Sairas ni, ‘En jakwadha
